query: pain management physician in merrimack, new hampshire, united states

name: James A Mirazita, MD
description:
James A. Mirazita, MD, is a board certified anesthesiologist and pain management specialist at Oasis Recovery. At the practice's three locations in Nashua, Bedford, and Concord, New Hampshire, he offers addiction treatment and recovery programs to help those with addiction overcome their dependencies.

Dr. Mirazita is a graduate of the Ohio State University College of Medicine in Columbus. He completed his internship in general surgery at David Grant USAF Medical Center at Travis Air Force Base in Fairfield, California.

He's kind, compassionate, empathetic, he listens without judgement, makes you feel at ease, he's an expert in his field, he has a great sense of humor and he's a consummate professional. I cannot express how much he will be missed, not only by myself, but also by the many other patients he treats at Granite State. I wish I had the opportunity to see Dr Doherty one last time before Granite State Pain Associates decided to lock the doors, no notice, no one answering phones or returning messages. I tried driving down but the doors have been locked all week and no one is in the building.

I've been seeing Dr Doherty for 5 years. He is an outstanding doctor. He cares about you and really listens. He's kind, compassionate, down to earth, funny and has always made me feel at ease. I've never felt judged by him. He is a real expert in his field and works with you to find solutions to manage pain. He doesn't force or push you to do anything. It's a true working relationship. I wish I had the opportunity to see Dr Doherty one last time before Granite State Pain Associates decided to lock the doors, no notice, no one answering phones or returning messages. I tried driving down but the doors have been locked all week and no one is in the building.

I've been seeing Dr Doherty for 5 years. He is an outstanding doctor. He cares about you and really listens. He's kind, compassionate, down to earth, funny and has always made me feel at ease. I've never felt judged by him. He is a real expert in his field and works with you to find solutions to manage pain. He doesn't force or push you to do anything. It's a true working relationship. I've never found another provider like that. I will truly miss working with him. I cannot thank him enough, not just for our work together but for treating me with dignity and being truly empathetic. Dr Doherty, I wish you all the best in the future. I will never find another provider like you.","original_language":"en","review_translated_text":null,"translated_language":null,"published_at":"Edited 6 months I opted for monitored sedation as I was apprehensive of the procedure. Dr Suchdev visited with me prior to the procedure and convinced me that I would not need the sedation for future injections as his procedure is more than tolerable and painless without it. On top of that, I've taken time off work (losing money) to go to an appointment today, only to be told when I arrive that "we don't have it" and I'll need to come back another day. This shows no respect for patients' time.

I will not be going near New Hampshire Nuero Spine Institute or Dr. Batlivala again.","original_language":"en","review_translated_text":null,"translated_language":null,"published_at":"a year ago","published_at_date":"2024-08-05T16:41:15","response_from_owner_text":null,"response_from_owner_ago":null,"response_from_owner_date":null,"response_from_owner_translated_text":null,"avatar_link":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8gVV1Eok-kpH1m3jT7Q5qa_tjGXDdMxNx84fi3J_ItY43Zto=s1920","total_number_of_reviews_by_reviewer":6,"total_number_of_photos_by_reviewer":3,"is_local_guide":false,"experience_details":[],"review_photos":[],"review_origin":"google"},{"review_id":"ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSURPcVlhbm1nRRAB","review_link":"https://www.google.com/maps/reviews/data=!4m8!14m7!1m6!2m5!1sChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSURPcVlhbm1nRRAB!2m1!1s0x0:0x8ac006acfb786b!3m1!1s2@1:CIHM0ogKEICAgIDOqYanmgE%7CCgsIzeqhlgYQ-JiKOw%7C?hl=en-US","name":"Cara Fiske","reviewer_id":"101115322843228127529","reviewer_profile":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101115322843228127529?hl=en-US","rating":1,"review_text":"I did not have a good experience. I waited from 11:25am until 12:45pm to see the doctor. My appointment was at 12pm, I was asked to be early for xrays. No one even acknowledged the delay.

The nurse was very friendly and thorough, but Dr Batlivala was a huge disappointment. The nurse spent more time with me than he did. His bedside manner is terrible. He barely greeted me, never smiled, and hardly even made eye contact. His questions seemed like more of an interrogation than like he wanted to get to know me/help me. He kept asking why I was there, and what I wanted from him (which felt very weird and made me uncomfortable). I have issues with my back, and also autoimmune and neurological disorders. I was recently diagnosed with SFN, and also have lupus. I suffer from back pain and nerve pain and migraine headaches. I have seen several specialists and very much wanted to consolidate care.

I read everything on the website. I was so hopeful that I had found a place that could treat me, and a place where providers would work together on a treatment plan. I told Dr Batlivala that and he told me that is unrealistic, and that doctors don't have time to talk to eachother (maybe he needs to spend time on the website). He barely examined me. He didn't even ask me to come back.

I waited months for this appointment, hoping to meet a provider who could help. I hoped to find  a practice that would treat me as a whole person (and offer something besides pills). I waited from 11:25am until 12:45pm to see the doctor. My appointment was at 12pm, I was asked to be early for xrays. No one even acknowledged the delay.

The nurse was very friendly and thorough, but Dr Batlivala was a huge disappointment. The nurse spent more time with me than he did. His bedside manner is terrible. He barely greeted me, never smiled, and hardly even made eye contact. His questions seemed like more of an interrogation than like he wanted to get to know me/help me. He kept asking why I was there, and what I wanted from him (which felt very weird and made me uncomfortable). I have issues with my back, and also autoimmune and neurological disorders. I was recently diagnosed with SFN, and also have lupus. I suffer from back pain and nerve pain and migraine headaches. I have seen several specialists and very much wanted to consolidate care.

I read everything on the website. I was so hopeful that I had found a place that could treat me, and a place where providers would work together on a treatment plan. I told Dr Batlivala that and he told me that is unrealistic, and that doctors don't have time to talk to eachother (maybe he needs to spend time on the website). He barely examined me. He didn't even ask me to come back.

I waited months for this appointment, hoping to meet a provider who could help. I hoped to find  a practice that would treat me as a whole person (and offer something besides pills). I was crying by the time I made it back to the elevator. Very disheartened by the lack of care and compassion.","original_language":"en","review_translated_text":null,"translated_language":null,"published_at":"3 years ago","published_at_date":"2022-07-08T18:19:57","response_from_owner_text":null,"response_from_owner_ago":null,"response_from_owner_date":null,"response_from_owner_translated_text":null,"avatar_link":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsEUzhdEtCbw7IbXs2JoSA-4H3pp98-8p3u8Z7A00HpA0p22jG=s1920","total_number_of_reviews_by_reviewer":21,"total_number_of_photos_by_reviewer":29,"is_local_guide":true,"experience_details":[],"review_photos":[],"review_origin":"google"},{"review_id":"ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSURzN3V2Vjl3RRAB","review_link":"https://www.google.com/maps/reviews/data=!4m8!14m7!1m6!2m5!1sChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSURzN3V2Vjl3RRAB!2m1!1s0x0:0x8ac006acfb786b!3m1!1s2@1:CIHM0ogKEICAgIDs7uvV9wE%7CCgsI1L6A8wUQ0ODLWw%7C?hl=en","name":"Samantha Perkins","reviewer_id":"117979034868679770271","reviewer_profile":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117979034868679770271?hl=en","rating":5,"review_text":"He was a great doctor he talked me thru my whole procedure I had for testing for carpal tunnel syndrome. query: pain management physician in merrimack, new hampshire, united states

name: Integrated Pain Care
description: Integrated Pain Care is a unique medical alliance bringing together a team of health professionals to help individuals cope with and alleviate physical and emotional pain. By integrating the use of various proven therapies, we fully maximize the pain-reduction capabilities of each and every therapy, while also synergistically combining treatments for an even higher result.

My pain keeps worsening under his care.  Muscle relaxers not helpful.  Confused about why I'm prescribed muscle relaxers when they don't help.  If I wanted more muscle relaxers, why would I see a pain specialist and not my PCP?","original_language":"en","review_translated_text":null,"translated_language":null,"published_at":"2 months ago","published_at_date":"2025-10-06T17:42:25","response_from_owner_text":null,"response_from_owner_ago":null,"response_from_owner_date":null,"response_from_owner_translated_text":null,"avatar_link":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLuJKzoVqozMEzsjNIbFkVvIO_IZwd6nzIYTqLswC3e8ec9hg=s1920","total_number_of_reviews_by_reviewer":1,"total_number_of_photos_by_reviewer":0,"is_local_guide":false,"experience_details":[],"review_photos":[],"review_origin":"google"},{"review_id":"Ci9DQUlRQUNvZENodHljRjlvT2xKU1UzZGpVRVJyVkc1M2MwTjJSM2RHZWpSNlEyYxAB","review_link":"https://www.google.com/maps/reviews/data=!4m8!14m7!1m6!2m5!1sCi9DQUlRQUNvZENodHljRjlvT2xKU1UzZGpVRVJyVkc1M2MwTjJSM2RHZWpSNlEyYxAB!2m1!1s0x0:0xa02f6ea124b3ae87!3m1!1s2@1:CAIQACodChtycF9oOlJSU3djUERrVG53c0N2R3dGejR6Q2c%7C0cnDaliree-%7C?hl=en-US","name":"Christine B","reviewer_id":"114530819579815480853","reviewer_profile":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114530819579815480853?hl=en-US","rating":1,"review_text":"My husband drove 2 hours to get to his appointment and he forgot his paperwork, he's in a lot of pain and never gets a full night sleep so of course he forgets things... I told him I'd scan it over to them via fax or email and they said they don't have a working printer!!! Really how do you not have proper equipment to run a medical office? So there's  only one printer in that entire office?? So then they made him reschedule another month out and 2 more hours of driving back home, another month this poor man has to suffer? Walmart has printers, I just don't get it! I run a business and I have back ups for my pc printers phones ect and if there's something I didn't have a back up I would go and purchase one!!!","original_language":"en","review_translated_text":null,"translated_language":null,"published_at":"Edited 3 months ago","published_at_date":"2025-09-10T15:24:05","response_from_owner_text":"We are truly sorry to hear that you were dissatisfied with how things unfolded during your husband's recent visit to our office. We would like clarify that our entire system experienced an outage that day, as well as other businesses in the area. This included our internet and our printers in the office going offline during this outage. Our IT staff worked diligently with our internet provider to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. 

We stressed to your husband via phone when he booked this appointment, as well as in an email and a reminder text the day before his appointment, that completed paperwork is required when arriving at the office as a new patient. We rely on our patients to fulfill the requirements we have put in place for all of our patients to ensure timely, thorough and competent patient care.

If you feel that our office may not be able to adequately meet your husband's needs moving forward, we would be happy to provide recommendations other pain management practices. Please feel free to contact our office by phone at any time.","response_from_owner_ago":"3 months ago","response_from_owner_date":"2025-09-17T01:44:59","response_from_owner_translated_text":null,"avatar_link":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgqbm_ftg-eocdzFOpY-YCb5u8l5sDC-m3nRssttgfeTykapY=s1920","total_number_of_reviews_by_reviewer":19,"total_number_of_photos_by_reviewer":5,"is_local_guide":true,"experience_details":[],"review_photos":[],"review_origin":"google"},{"review_id":"Ci9DQUlRQUNvZENodHljRjlvT2tocFIwUnNOVU5TV2pkelNVOXFSR2d3TXpCa1dHYxAB","review_link":"https://www.google.com/maps/reviews/data=!4m8!14m7!1m6!2m5!1sCi9DQUlRQUNvZENodHljRjlvT2tocFIwUnNOVU5TV2pkelNVOXFSR2d3TXpCa1dHYxAB!2m1!1s0x0:0xa02f6ea124b3ae87!3m1!1s2@1:CAIQACodChtycF9oOkhpR0RsNUNSWjdzSU9qRGgwMzBkWGc%7C0ckNsu8bAA4%7C?hl=en-US","name":"John Berkery","reviewer_id":"113149548897465059558","reviewer_profile":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113149548897465059558?hl=en-US","rating":1,"review_text":"Waited a long time to get an appointment, drove 2 hours to get here and I forgot my paperwork they had me fill out so they said we can't see you and rescheduled me for almost another month out leaving me in pain. I asked if they could print it out and they said their printer is broken, I asked them if I could mail it to them and they said nope you need to come back so I wasted 4 hours driving there and back and left in pain. Horrible customer service and no compassion for their clients.","original_language":"en","review_translated_text":null,"translated_language":null,"published_at":"3 months ago","published_at_date":"2025-09-10T14:42:02","response_from_owner_text":"Similar to the review left by what appears to be your wife concerning the same visit, we are truly sorry to hear that you were dissatisfied with your recent visit to our office. 

When we initially spoke with you on the phone, again via email and lastly with a text reminder, we reiterated that completed paperwork is required when arriving at the office as a new patient. This is the same requirement for all patients and is essential to ensure an efficient, safe and helpful visit with one of our compassionate providers. We want to ensure we have all pertinent information and can utilize the time during your appointment to truly focus on your health and a collaborative plan between patient and provider. As such, we rely on our patients to fulfill the requirements we have put in place for all of our patients.

If you feel that our office may not be able to adequately meet your needs, please feel free to contact us by phone at any time.","response_from_owner_ago":"3 months ago","response_from_owner_date":"2025-09-17T01:50:56","response_from_owner_translated_text":null,"avatar_link":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUY-smhsdOVwtnQKfy9DTfaKxPIJDQ-e90CInnNlhy-DyTHneC0Rw=s1920","total_number_of_reviews_by_reviewer":14,"total_number_of_photos_by_reviewer":3,"is_local_guide":true,"experience_details":[],"review_photos":[],"review_origin":"google"},{"review_id":"ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSURqdE9qSzRnRRAB","review_link":"https://www.google.com/maps/reviews/data=!4m8!14m7!1m6!2m5!1sChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSURqdE9qSzRnRRAB!2m1!1s0x0:0xa02f6ea124b3ae87!3m1!1s2@1:CIHM0ogKEICAgIDjtOjK4gE%7CCgwItOfAsQYQqIOAvAE%7C?hl=en-US","name":"Sandra Leto","reviewer_id":"113292760245995212489","reviewer_profile":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113292760245995212489?hl=en-US","rating":5,"review_text":"Mark has been so good at meeting my pain management needs. column62: pain management physician in merrimack, new hampshire, united states

name: Pain Specialty Group
description:
Specializing In You
Serving the residents of New Hampshire's Seacoast & Maine
Pain Specialty Group offers leading-edge pain therapies and comprehensive precision pain medicine for patients in Newmarket and Newington, Portsmouth, and the surrounding areas of New Hampshire's Seacoast and Maine.
The practice specializes in providing personalized, advanced interventional pain management and regenerative medicine treatments for all types of chronic pain conditions, including sports injuries, arthritis, back pain, sciatica, work injuries, and pain after auto accidents.
The senior providers at Pain Specialty Group are Anh Ngo, MD, MBA, and Manuel G. Sanchez, MD. Dr. Ngo and Dr.

I drove a hour, looking at your website I was hoping I could get some relief or answers, which I have not gotten in the past. However, the doctor was condescending and kept interrupting me, clearly not listening and showing no empathy or consideration. He had canned responses to everything and couldn't get out of there fast enough. Being in pain for 20 (since I was 20) he told me the pain was related to \"old age\"- I'm not sure how that relates to my pain at age 20 and asked about my current job, again not related to the last 20 years. He basically told me to exercise and offered pills. I was hoping to get some sort of diagnosis and recommendation for treatment, not just mask it with medicine. I will definitely never be back and would never recommend you to anyone. As a side note, the office told me I didn't need a referral, but the doctor said that I did  and that the office just tells you that to get you an appointment. I also asked what the copay would be, the person I spoke with said he didn't know but probably $40, my understanding is that the office can check on the insurance but after confirming with my insurance the copay was actually $100. name: Dr. Aaron S. Geller, MD
description: Dr. Geller offers non-pharmacological medical guidance as well as evaluation for topical, oral, and interventional pharmacologic treatment. He offers superficial local anesthetic injections in terms of trigger point injections and superficial nerve blocks. Dr.Geller offers safe, effective medical pain management.

The first two pain management providers loaded me up on heavy pain killers making it difficult to function and earn an honest income while raising 3 children and providing for my family.

I met with Dr Geller and we spoke of reducing the opioids to a minimum and doing injections as an alternative, it saved my life and lifestyle as it worked and have continued the treatments for 17 years now. Dr Geller cares about "you" not what the book says it pays.

Dr Geller is the definition of what anyone should look for in there doctor. He is also a wonderful person. Dr Geller thank you for all you have done for me and my family.

Sincerely,

Tom P

Sincerely,

Tom P
